page.title: 12A FIREMAN'S DAY
page.content: At 9.00 fireman Cox checks the fire engines and all of the equipment. At 9.30 he practises on the tower or at a factory or shop until 11.30. He checks all the equipment again until 1.00. Sometimes firemen get parties of schoolchildren and adults to talk about fire safety. When they check the equipment they make sure that the watertanker is full. All of the firemen have bleepers so that the station can contact them. In the afternoon the firemen clean the engines lights and make sure that the siren is working. Some days the fireman has no calls at all,some days he can have about 4 calls or more. The firemen get called out for fires and floods and to save animals.
